titleStmt.title: A sermon on the Second Commandement preached in Saint Pauls Church, Ianuarie 6. 1623. By Iohn Squire vicar of Saint Leonard in Shorditch by London.
titleStmt.author: Squire, John, ca. 1588-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W[illiam] S[tansby] for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sold at his shops at the signe of the Starre vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornhill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: The year of the sermon is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
